comments.content: What is the font for the Arista Records logo?

Don't know such a font. Possibly custom and heavily. Best I could say would be having a look to these 2 sections at DaFont [Techno \> Sci-fi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043028/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303) and [Techno \> Various](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043028/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=304).
I would think this is art and not a font.
What is the character map of this logo?
What do you mean with ‘character map’?
Because I want to know the font's character map for this logo.
It is not a font - it may have started as something based on type but it is now art - vector art as in an Adobe Illustrator file.
